channel.title: I need help turning into a NPC
channel.description: k, I"m working on my server and i need to know how to make my account into a dragon, and dragon of any kind. ive went through the Tuts section and found one but it did not work and ive heard of a command "::npc ####" but that does not work or maby its wrong. well can anyone help? :rolleyes:

item.title: I need help turning into a NPC
item.dc:creator: @getsome getsome
item.description:
@getsome wrote:

1-PROPER ENGLISH!

2-ok your a starter but il try to explain…

the emotes of the walk/stand etc are based on a person/player it is not possible to walk like a real dragon if u do not have these emotes and u do not have the knowledgend of editing the emotes so u walk like a dragon when u are a dragon.

to change into a npc u type ::pnpc NPC ID here
for example the kbd (king black dragon) ::pnpc 50

will make u change in a dragon and then u will see what i mean whit the rong emotes.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help turning into a NPC
